content: Businesses often have a list of 5-10 'mission statements' featured in their brochures, on their websites or hanging in their office detailing the values they hold as a form of communication to their employees, their clients and the public.
translations: ita:Le aziende spesso hanno un elenco di 5-10 dichiarazioni di missione presenti nei loro opuscoli, sui loro siti web o appe
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by eastasiastudent (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
